ygData.msgSnippet: Ooh....Good question! Ill have to give that a try tonight.  Maybe we can get a couple of people to run this experiment and we can compile the results. Fystro
ygData.messageBody:
Ooh....Good question!
Ill have to give that a try tonight. Maybe we can get a couple of people to
run this experiment and we can compile the results.

Fystro of Solusek Ro
